instruction: Create an outline for a blog post about machine learning.
output:
Outline for a Blog Post about Machine Learning: 
I. Introduction 
A. Definition of Machine Learning 
B. Overview of Its Use in the Industry  

II. Applications of Machine Learning 
A. Natural Language Processing
B. Medical Research 
C. Robotics 

III. Advantages 
A. Faster Decision Making 
B. Data Storage 
C. Personalization 

IV. Challenges 
A. Scarcity of Data 
B. High Costs 
C. Model Bias 

V. Conclusion 
A. Benefits of Machine Learning 
B. Possibilities in the Future of the Technology
